reviews.review_msg: Most unprofessional prof in my 6 years at SFU. Rude with students/TA, spent one hour arguing about midterm grades with the class during lecture. Released grades after WD. Office hours were during one of the tutorials. Project outline was impossible to follow, strict formatting. Most the class went to the chair, nothing was done. Avoid at all costs.

I've never had a more negative experience with a professor at SFU. Stunning lack of respect for students and TA, no clarity on project outlines and exam expectaions, and was even 10 min late for the final. Avoid at all cost, the kin dept. isn't getting rid of him any time soon. Course content isn't hard, but he makes it feel like climbing Everest.

This is the worst professor I have ever had in all my years at SFU. I cannot even begin to explain how frustrated I am with BPK 312. This is a very poorly laid out course with the most disorganized and jumbled slides that are extremely LONG and boring. There is an INSANE amount of irrelevant info that you're expected to know! AVOID AT ALL COSTS!

Most unorganized prof I've had all 4 years at SFU. Battled with TA entire semester. Remarked all midterms after TA had finished marking & most students lost grades. TA left for 3 weeks (& I don't blame her) cause she was so fed up with him so he tried to run tutorials himself 
Anyway, didn't give him 1/5 cause he brought snacks for the last class

There are so many unnecessary projects and assignments in this class as well as extremely long lectures that have unlimited amounts of typos and are repetitive. Don't bother going to class since when he just READS off the slides he READS WRONG and confuses not only himself but everyone sitting there. Seems like his teaching days are behind him...

Dr. White was the worst professor I have had in my 3 years at SFU so far. His lecture slides were jam packed with info, to the point it took 10 min to understand a single slide, with lots of typos and useless info. He would just read off lecture slides during lecture, and was condescending when speaking to students. Huge miscommunications with TA.

Would recommend to avoid if possible. His slides are some of the worst I've seen in my 5 years at SFU (he does not event take the time to read them over; tons of spelling errors and things stated multiple times). Additionally, he has not bothered marking anything that occurred in the last 1.5 months. TA was the only reason this course was worked.

Wouldn't recommend this professor to any fellow students, by far one of the most boring lecturers ever in my academic life. I am not the only one, all my friends agreed that he literally went off the slides words by words, without expanding any useful material possible. Super disorganized, needed to send him several emails to get a reply

One of the worst professors that I have ever had. His lectures are old and are literally copied and pasted from the course textbook - verbatim. He reads off his lectures with no elaboration on any of the topics. His exam questions are poorly written and most often results in wrong answers, not because the topic is hard, but the ?s don't make sense

Nicest prof ever! He brought us timbits and coffee to class, how sweet! Plays jeopardy games with the class to give you a chance to boost your grade. Would definitely take another one of his classes! Thanks Matt :)

he seems to be a nice guy but he's so boring when he's lecturing, he tries though but he's so confusing and fast paced that he doesn't make anything clear. he basically repeats his slides. his exams are hard but still doable, his marking scheme is very detailed though and the group projects are totally killer since he marks so hard.
